Title: Datadog AI Research Lab Launches First-Ever Observability Foundation Model
Body:
In This Article:
Datadog, Inc. (NASDAQ:DDOG) unveiled on May 21 the first releases from its newly established Datadog AI Research division. The company introduced an open-source foundation model called Toto and an observability benchmark named BOOM. This launch coincides with the company's…
